amendatorysection.para: The administrator shall prepare a biennial report on the status of programs established by the administrator as provided in the Records Management Act and on the progress made during the preceding biennium in implementing and effectuating such programs and in reducing costs. Copies of this report shall be furnished to the Governor, the Clerk of the Legislature, and such other officials and state and local agencies as the Governor or the board shall direct. The report submitted to the Clerk of the Legislature shall be submitted electronically.
